STAFF ACCOUNTANT

SUMMARY

Skilled Accountant successful at managing multiple projects and consistently meeting deadlines under pressure.
Extensive knowledge of accounting software and processes. Additional ba ckground in payroll, employee management, hiring, training and benefits.
Highly detail-oriented and organized.
Highlights
Financial statement analysis Account reconciliation expert General ledger accounting
Effective time management Strong organizational skills Flexible team player

<JD_START>
Job Title: Staff Accountant – life sciences

Location: San Diego, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Staff Accountant – Life Sciences Research Group – San Diego! 

One of San Diego's leading research groups is seeking a Staff Accountant who can bring expertise to the team. The company is on a dramatic growth path with the strong demand for its unique product offerings, and offers exciting career opportunities. Interested? Your strong background in accounting combined with your interpersonal skills will help you to excel in this close-knit environment. Apply today to join, grow, and learn!

Who you are:

 Bachelor's in Accounting, Finance, or similar field.  2-4+ years of GL accounting experience.  Ellucian's Banner Finance system a plus!  Great organization skills and attention to detail. 


What you’ll do:

 Prepare monthly journal entries, reconciliations, and year-end audit schedules  AP/AR maintenance duties including preparing bank deposits, record outgoing ACH/wires, and assisting with direct deposits.  Prepare quarterly expense reports and sales tax reports.  Reports directly to the Controller. 


Why work here:

 High-growth environment: this company is rapidly expanding and is looking for people who can grow their headquarters practice!  Impact: influence results and make a positive impact on the team and company results – we'll listen to your voice.  Culture: Great company dynamic and culture. The company cares about their employees and others! 


What does this position pay?

 Compensation is determined by several factors which may include skillset, qualifications/certifications, experience level, and geographic location.  The expected range for this role is 55-72K, annualized base compensation, with additional compensation components. Please note this range is an estimate and actual may vary based on qualifications and experience. 


Please send your resume to Emma at ebruno@provenrecruiting.com if you have the requisite qualifications and are interested in the opportunity.

Note: We actively support and promote people of various backgrounds, from race, religion and gender to geographical area, university, lifestyle, and personality type. Proven Recruiting is minority-owned, majority women, and is a strong advocate for diversity and inclusion in the broader community. Do not hesitate to apply now!

Experience Level (if available): Associate
<JD_END>
